Html: I was able to get the start and end points to display as markers on an overlay, but how do I display driving directions between 2 points on the map? I didn't find anything in the forums re that. Using the windows forms version with google maps provider. Many thanks in advance !

it's not? ok then my next question is, can this be accomplished using this component? if so, could you please kindly point me to a how-to article? I have the 2 points I just need to display the directions from / to. many thanks!
do you ask how to get directions or how to add the route?

Sorry, it was a dumb mistake on my part - I was adding the markers to my overlay but forgetting to add the route. When I read your answer it just hit me - just as there is a list of markers, I thought there might also be a list of routes and, sure enough, it was there! I did OverlayOne.Routes.Add(r) and it now connected the 2 markers! Many thanks for this great component, it's truly awesome!
